question: The All-Compassionate, The Beneficent, The One who has plenty of mercy towards the believers and the blasphemers in this world and especially to the believers in the here-after. The Mercy to all.
The All-Merciful. The Kind one, The One who has plenty of mercy towards the believers in this world and in the here-after.
The King, The Sovereign Lord, The One with the complete Dominion, the One Whose Dominion is completely clear from imperfection.
